DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.BNFT_SYS_ID, a.BNFT_ID_NM, a.BNFT_DESC_TXT, a.BNFT_VRSN_NBR, a.BNFT_STTS_CD, a.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID,a.LST_CHG_USR, a.LST_CHG_TMS, a.CREATD_USER_ID, a.CREATD_TM_STMP,a.MNDT_TYPE, a.BNFT_ST_CD,b.CD_DESC_TXT, c.CD_DESC_TXT ,a.BNFT_TYPE,d.CD_DESC_TXT,a.BNFT_CTGRY from BMST_BNFT_MSTR a, ITEM b, ITEM c, ITEM d where BNFT_SYS_ID = ? AND (a.BNFT_ST_CD = b.PRMRY_CD(+) AND b.CTLG_ID(+) = 1626) AND (a.MNDT_TYPE = c.PRMRY_CD(+) AND c.CTLG_ID(+) = 1939) AND (a.BNFT_CTGRY = d.PRMRY_CD(+) AND d.CTLG_ID(+) = 2222)
select BNFT_SYS_ID, BNFT_ID_NM, BNFT_DESC_TXT, BNFT_VRSN_NBR, BNFT_STTS_CD, BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID, LST_CHG_USR, LST_CHG_TMS, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP from BMST_BNFT_MSTR where BNFT_ID_NM = {0}
select b.ENTY_SYS_ID, c.LOB_NM, c.BUS_ENTY_NM ,c.BUS_GRP_NM, c.MRKT_BUS_UNT from AVLBL_DOMN c,ENTY_DOMN_INFO b where B.DOMN_SYS_ID = C.DOMN_SYS_ID AND B.ENTY_NM = {0} AND B.ENTY_TYPE = 'stdbenefit'

select A.BNFT_SYS_ID,c.LOB_NM, c.BUS_ENTY_NM ,c.BUS_GRP_NM, c.MRKT_BUS_UNT from AVLBL_DOMN c,ENTY_DOMN_INFO b,BMST_BNFT_MSTR A where b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and A.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID != {1} and A.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( select B.ENTY_SYS_ID from ENTY_DOMN_INFO B, AVLBL_DOMN C where ( C.BUS_GRP_NM in 'ALL' or C.BUS_ENTY_NM in 'ALL' or C.LOB_NM in 'ALL' ) AND B.DOMN_SYS_ID = C.DOMN_SYS_ID AND B.ENTY_TYPE = 'stdbenefit' AND B.ENTY_NM = {0} )

SelectSQLQuery.name: locateStandardBenefit
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC: AND MSTR.BNFT_SYS_ID IN ( SELECT U.ENTY_SYS_ID FROM BNFT_BSIC_SLCTD_INFO U where U.SLCTD_ITEM_TYPE = 'data type' AND U.SLCTD_ITEM_CD {6} )
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: AND UPPER(MSTR.BNFT_ID_NM) like {7} escape '`' group by BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID, BNFT_ID_NM )) WHERE ROWNUM <= 51 order by BNFT_ID_NM asc

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select BNFT_SYS_ID from BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN where BNFT_SYS_ID = {0}

SELECT BNFT_SYS_ID, BNFT_ID_NM, BNFT_DESC_TXT, BNFT_VRSN_NBR, BNFT_STTS_CD, BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM BMST_BNFT_MSTR WHERE BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID = (SELECT BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM BMST_BNFT_MSTR where BMST_BNFT_MSTR.BNFT_SYS_ID= {0}) order by BNFT_VRSN_NBR desc

SelectSQLQuery.name: locateBenefits
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT distinct B.ENTY_SYS_ID, B.ENTY_SYS_ID, B.ENTY_NM from BMST_BNFT_MSTR A,ENTY_DOMN_INFO B, AVLBL_DOMN C WHERE 1 = 1 and B.ENTY_TYPE = 'stdbenefit' AND B.DOMN_SYS_ID = C.DOMN_SYS_ID and A.BNFT_ID_NM = B.ENTY_NM and A.BNFT_TYPE != 'MANDATE' and A.BNFT_STTS_CD !='MARKED_FOR_DELETION' and to_char(B. ENTY_SYS_ID) not in (select ENTY_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN where ENTY_TYPE ='AVAILBENEFIT' and NOTE_ID= {4} AND NOTE_VRSN_NBR IN ( SELECT NOTE_VRSN_NBR FROM NMST_NOTE_MSTR WHERE NOTE_ID = {4} AND NOTE_STTS_CD != 'MARKED_FOR_DELETION'))
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC: AND A.BNFT_ID_NM in (select BNFT_ID_NM from BMST_BNFT_MSTR where BNFT_ID_NM LIKE {0} escape '`' or BNFT_ID_NM LIKE UPPER ({0}) escape '`' or BNFT_ID_NM LIKE LOWER ({0}) escape '`')

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: CALL COPYSTANDARDBENEFITPROC( {0},{1},{2},{3},{4})
CALL CHECKOUTSTANDARDBENEFITPROC( {0},{1},{2},{3} )
CALL DELETESTANDARDBENEFITPROC({0}, {1},{2} )

SelectSQLQuery.name: findDuplicateBenefits
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select A.BNFT_SYS_ID from BMST_BNFT_MSTR A, ENTY_DOMN_INFO B, AVLBL_DOMN C where A.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID != {0} and A.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID = B.ENTY_SYS_ID and B.ENTY_TYPE='stdbenefit' and B.DOMN_SYS_ID = C.DOMN_SYS_ID

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: insert into BMST_BNFT_MSTR (BNFT_SYS_ID, BNFT_ID_NM, BNFT_DESC_TXT, BNFT_VRSN_NBR, BNFT_STTS_CD, BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID, LST_CHG_USR, LST_CHG_TMS, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP,BNFT_TYPE,MNDT_TYPE,BNFT_ST_CD,BNFT_CTGRY) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update BMST_BNFT_MSTR SET BNFT_ID_NM = ?, BNFT_DESC_TXT = ?, BNFT_VRSN_NBR = ?, BNFT_STTS_CD = ?, LST_CHG_USR = ?, LST_CHG_TMS = ?,BNFT_TYPE = ?,MNDT_TYPE = ?,BNFT_ST_CD = ?,BNFT_CTGRY = ? where BNFT_SYS_ID =?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT rule_id, rule_shrt_desc,rule_grp_ind,'' rule_srch_word_1,'' rule_srch_word_2, '' rule_srch_word_3,tag,rule_vrsn_nbr FROM rule WHERE rule_id = ?
SELECT rule_id, rule_shrt_desc FROM rule WHERE rule_typ_cd = 'WPDAUTOBG' AND wpd_del_flag = 'N' AND rule_shrt_desc LIKE ({0}) ORDER BY rule_id,rule_shrt_desc asc

SELECT A.rule_id, A.rule_shrt_desc FROM rule A WHERE A.rule_typ_cd = 'WPDAUTOBG' AND A.wpd_del_flag = 'N' AND A.rule_id not in (select rule_id from BX_RULE_MAPPING ) AND A.rule_id like upper({0}) ORDER BY A.rule_id,A.rule_shrt_desc asc

SELECT A.rule_id, A.rule_shrt_desc FROM rule A WHERE A.rule_typ_cd = 'WPDAUTOBG' AND A.wpd_del_flag = 'N' AND A.rule_id not in (select rule_id from BX_RULE_MAPPING ) ORDER BY A.rule_id,A.rule_shrt_desc asc
select p.RULE_ID,r.WPD_DEL_FLAG from RULE r,ENTY_RULE_INFO_ASSN p where r.RULE_ID=p.RULE_ID and r.WPD_DEL_FLAG='Y' and p.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and p.ENTY_TYPE={1} and p.RULE_ID = {2}
SELECT a.rule_id, a.rule_shrt_desc FROM rule a, grp_rule b WHERE a.rule_id = b.rule_id AND b.wpd_del_flag = 'N' AND b.grp_rule_id = {0} ORDER BY rule_id,rule_shrt_desc asc

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT am_sps_term_cd from bnft_ln_term_mapg where am_sps_term_cd= {0}
